library(DataComputing)

<!-- put your content after this line -->



```{r cache = TRUE}
data_site <- "http://tiny.cc/dcf/2014-Q4-Trips-History-Data-Small.rds"
Trips <- readRDS(gzcon(url(data_site)))
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(Trips, aes(x=sdate))+geom_density()
```

```{r}
times <- Trips %>% mutate(time_of_day = lubridate::hour(sdate)+lubridate::minute(sdate)/60)
ggplot(times, aes(x=time_of_day))+geom_density() 
```

```{r}
times <- times %>% mutate(day_of_week = lubridate::wday(sdate))
ggplot(times, aes(x=time_of_day))+geom_density()+facet_wrap(~day_of_week)

```

```{r}
ggplot(times, aes(x=time_of_day)) + geom_density(aes(fill=client), alpha=0.4)+facet_wrap(~day_of_week)
```


```{r}
ggplot(times, aes(x=time_of_day)) + geom_density(position_stack()) +  alpha=0.4)+facet_wrap(~day_of_week)
```

```{r}
mutate(wday = ifelse(lubridate::wday(sdate) %n% c(1,7),"weekend", "weekday"))
```
